description: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one (1) new Self-Propelled Forage Plot Harvester.
full_summary:
================KeySpec

Government Tender Announcement
-----------------------------

### Solicitation Number

* Soliciation Number: WS3486464848

### Essential Information

* Tender Title: Forage Plot Harvester Acquisition
* Period of Provision: 10/25/2022 to 12/01/2023

### Scope of Supply

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada requires a new Self-Propelled Forage Plot Harvester for farming purposes.

### Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information

* Name: Matthew Keenan (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice Details

* Publication Date: 09/01/2022
* Tender Closing: 10/14/2022 at 14:00 CDT
* Original Solicitation: Canceled by this announcement
* Debrieffing Session: Available upon request to previous bidders

### Amendment Information

* Amendment Date: 10/04/2022
* Amendment Number: 2

### Contracting Requirements

The new Self-Propelled Forage Plot Harvester should meet the requirements of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, including its specifications, delivery, and warranty.

### Notice Link

* Consult the Ariba Discovery notice for the full specification and submission instructions: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13993320?extsite=MTM5OTMzMjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
